decks.notes: This Esper Control deck focuses on manipulating the opponent's resources and controlling the board with a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw. The goal is to outvalue the opponent by efficiently answering threats while drawing into key pieces like Jace, the Perfected Mind and The Wandering Emperor to generate card advantage. By disrupting the opponent's game plan and grinding out incremental advantages, this deck aims to establish control of the game and eventually win through attrition.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, card draw, and powerful creatures. Aftermath Analyst and Brokers Hideout provide card advantage, while Ill-Timed Explosion and Memory Deluge help control the board. Nissa, Resurgent Animist and Shigeki, Jukai Visionary act as win conditions, supported by Fires of Victory and Virtue of Strength. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by efficiently managing resources and strategically deploying threats to secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and establish control of the battlefield. By efficiently removing threats and deploying powerful creatures like Vial Smasher, Gleeful Grenadier and Titania, Voice of Gaea, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and finish the game before they can stabilize. With a mix of removal, creatures, and land support, the deck aims to maintain tempo and apply constant pressure to secure victory.

This aggro deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently through a combination of direct burn spells, creatures with haste, and pump-up cards. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of aggressive threats and spell-based damage, while also utilizing cards like Urabrask's Forge and Kumano Faces Kakkazan to further increase its damage output. The deck's synergy is based on quickly building up a powerful board presence and ending the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced, aggressive strategy using a combination of creatures with evasion abilities and disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and control the game. Key cards like Faerie Mastermind and Spyglass Siren provide value and card advantage, while Raffine, Scheming Seer and Lazav, Wearer of Faces offer flexibility and versatility in adapting to different situations. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain a tempo advantage throughout the game, utilizing a mix of evasion, disruption, and card advantage to secure victory.

This Esper Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with aggressive creatures like Faerie Mastermind and Deep-Cavern Bat, supported by cards like No More Lies and Cut Down to control the board. The deck also includes powerful legendary creatures like Raffine, Scheming Seer and Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal for additional threats. The mana base is designed to support the color requirements of the deck, ensuring a smooth curve and consistent plays. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain control of the game to secure a victory.

This Esper Aggro deck is focused on disrupting your opponent's strategy with cards like No More Lies and Go for the Throat, while also building up a board presence with creatures like Faerie Mastermind and Deep-Cavern Bat. It also utilizes powerful land cards like Restless Anchorage and Raffine's Tower to gain an advantage. The deck aims to control the battlefield and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of removal spells and aggressive creatures. Ultimately, it seeks to maintain pressure on the opponent and secure victory through a combination of smart plays and careful timing.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful spells to put pressure on the opponent. The deck includes a mix of cheap removal spells to control the board, along with efficient creatures like Tinybones and Marchesa to deal damage and generate card advantage. The deck also includes powerful legendary creatures like Sheoldred and Lazav to provide additional threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is designed to support the deck's Grixis color combination, allowing for flexibility in casting spells and creatures.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a mix of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. The deck aims to control the battlefield through removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, while also pressuring opponents with aggressive creatures like Mosswood Dreadknight and Caustic Bronco. The addition of cards like Duress and Glissa Sunslayer allows the deck to disrupt opponents' game plans and maintain card advantage. With a blend of removal, disruption, and aggressive threats, this deck can quickly outpace and outmaneuver opponents in 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing various spells to manipulate the board state and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key strategy involves countering and removing threats while drawing cards and establishing card advantage through powerful card draw effects. The deck aims to outlast the opponent by efficiently managing resources and maintaining control of the game tempo. With a combination of counterspells, removal, and card advantage, this deck seeks to grind out incremental advantages and ultimately win through attrition and resource management.
